dtliExcerpt: Mary-Louise Parker brings fierce intelligence and psychological complexity to Ibsen's manipulative heroine, making this revival crackle with dangerous energy.
bwwExcerpt: Mary-Louise Parker's interpretation of "Hedda Gabler" was probably always going to be a little wacky, but in the Roundabout revival she's the loopiest of a fairly off-kilter bunch.
